title: Chicken Cacciatore
ingredients: ['250g plain flour for coating', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 whole 2 to 2.5kg chicken, cut into pieces', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '125ml white wine', '200g punnet fresh mushrooms, quartered', 'salt and pepper to taste']
